review: Fast streaming, easiest set-up in the world, fantastic voice-search - what's NOT to like? And a good set of content through PRIME to boot. My husband and I love Fire TV Box (as well as the conch shell hubby holds in his other hand).

review: It works great for Netflix and Amazon TV shows/movies, but I am disappointed I can't use my XFINITY account to watch HBO Go.  Although, I realize that's probably Comcast's fault, and not Amazon's.

review: By far the best streaming video product on the market! Super fast and easy to use. Love it
